Form a function to check the Satellite Cassini status and manage operations.
	 
		[       ]satelliteStatus(status)
			// satelliteStatus CODE  
			
		FUNCTION manageSatellite
		  WHILE TRUE
			SET status = I
			
			[      ]satelliteStatus(status)
			IF status == 'A' THEN
			  SET active = 1
				ELSE
				   SET active = 0
			  SET inRange = 1  
			IF Active == 0 
			   PRINT Rebooting satellite...
			   SET status = 'A'  
			IF inRange == 0 
			
			[      ]Getting closer to the satellite...
			  SET inRange = 1  
			IF active == 1 AND inRange == 1 THEN
			   PRINT Satellite is active and in range
